Resistance.help: The Eye of Merulina cannot be moved. It is resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear, Confuse, Teleport and psionic and all damage.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto Res Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear, Confuse, Teleport, All Dam
Resistance.targetHelp: The Eye of Merulina cannot be moved. It is resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear, Confuse, Teleport and psionic and all damage.
Resistance.targetShortHelp: Auto Res Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Fear, Confuse, Teleport, All Dam

Sonic_Dispersion.help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The Sonic Dispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Dispersion.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All Damage except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.targetHelp: The Sonic Bubble is granting you Resistance to all types of damage as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.
Sonic_Dispersion.targetShortHelp: +Res(All Damage but Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Dispersion.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Shriek.help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target and weakening his Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Shriek.targetHelp: The sonic Shriek has weakened you. You are more vulnerable to damage.

Scream.help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening his resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Scream.targetHelp: You are being buffeted by waves of sound and taking damage! Your Damage Resistance has been reduced.

Howl.help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: Medium, Recharge: Slow
Howl.targetHelp: The Howl has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Shockwave.help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Shout.help: You blast your foe with a tremendous Shout, damaging him and reducing his Damage Resistance. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Shout.targetHelp: The sonic Shout has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Sirens_Song.help: You send forth a subsonic pulse which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will waken if disturbed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Long
Sirens_Song.targetHelp: The Siren's Song has rendered you unconscious.

Screech.help: By bursting forth with this hypersonic Screech, you can disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Screech.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.

Dreadful_Wail.help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Dreadful_Wail.targetHelp: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.
